gameplayModel

Class GameContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameplayModel.GameContext

  • public class GameContext
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages the user interface as well as high level components of the gameplay. Aspects such as Score, Time, current level, and the generation of the gridMap are all controlled and modified through internal methods.
    Author:
    Olivier Laforest

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameContext

        public GameContext()
        Constructs a new default game at level 1 with starting base parameters

      • GameContext

        public GameContext(int selectedLevel)
        Constructs a new default game at selectedLevel with starting base parameters
        Parameters:
        selectedLevel - The selected starting level of a new game

      • GameContext

        public GameContext(int time,
           int lives,
           int score,
           int level,
           GridMap gridMap)
        Constructs a specified game from a save
        Parameters:
        time - The remaining amount of time on the game timer
        lives - The number of remaining lives
        score - The current score of the save
        level - The current gameplay level of the save
        gridMap - positions and conditions of all gridMap objects from the save

      • getGridMap

        Returns:

      • getEndGameEnemiesStatus

        public boolean getEndGameEnemiesStatus()
        Returns:
        a boolean to check if the timer has reached 0 and if end of level enemies have spawned

      • setEndGameEnemiesStatus

        public void setEndGameEnemiesStatus(boolean status)
        Parameters:
